map_info: Click on a country to display its informations
map_title: The Privatisation of Hospitals and Nursing Homes in Europe
map_sources: Marketbeat: European Nursing Homes Report, Cushman&Wakefield, 2019 ; Hospital  Healthcare Europe, Healthcare Data, 2019 ; Eurofund 2019 ; Own calculations.
operating_margin_def: This indicator refers to what the firm earns on average from each product sold. It is calculated by dividing the operating profit by the revenue.
profit_rate_def: This indicator is the ratio of profit to invested capital; it is calculated by dividing the net profit by the company's equity.
